Immediate Objective 1: Improved access to basic services for conflict affected communities

description.narrative:
This PROMISE project will improve the resilience of 75,000 highly vulnerable individuals in conflict-affected communities in Syria. The project will adopt a holistic approach to interventions based on ongoing context assessments and will address emergency needs through both lifesaving and sustainable approaches in the sectors of WASH, health, protection and education.
The project activities are based on and fully compliant with the three Strategic Objectives (SO) of the Syrian Humanitarian Response Plan (HRP 2019 draft) including SO1 (Save Lives), SO2 (Enhance Protection) and SO3 (Increase Resilience and Access to Services).
